# fileNames

**Instance Property**

An array containing names of the promised files being written to the destination location.

## Declaration

```swift
var fileNames: [String] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property returns an empty array until the file promise is called using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFilePromiseReceiver/receivePromisedFiles(atDestination:options:operationQueue:reader:)].

## Instance Properties

- **fileTypes**: An array containing types of the promised files being written to the destination location.
